svg.text: The Scalability of the SCI Cycle
From Personal Development to Planetary Governance

g.text: Individual decision-making • Self-reflection • Personal growth • Values integration
Example: Career choice using diverse perspectives, challenging assumptions, integrating insights
Local governance • Community stakeholders • Policy development • Civic engagement
Example: Urban planning integrating resident, business, and environmental perspectives
National policy • Parliamentary debate • Multi-party synthesis • Democratic deliberation
Example: Healthcare reform breaking partisan gridlock through integrative solutions
International cooperation • Multi-national interests • Cultural diversity • Global equity
Example: COP climate negotiations balancing economic growth with emissions reductions
Biosphere stewardship • Intergenerational justice • Species wellbeing • Cosmic perspective
Example: Global frameworks integrating human, ecological, and future generations' needs
CONSISTENT SCI METHODOLOGY ACROSS ALL SCALES

svg.text: Universal Methodology • Scalable Framework • Consistent Process • Tier 2 Consciousness Development
